column4: why does my system monitor read all processes as sleeping? Even the ones I'm using.
even when they are in use?
I keep getting the error 'make sure hald is running'...
I have grip installed, sound juicer ripper and something else...i was desparate
you will probably need to install gstreamer0.8-mad
you need the repository hawke_ suggested first
enable it as he said in the package manager
it should be - the other way is to edit /etc/apt/source.list
can I pm you? I could flood my list in there and you could use it as a template
usually you do  sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list  , uncomment the relevant lines, and save the file
by the way, thanks again for the help!
